Reviews.Title: “The worst”
Reviews.Author: Stesha B
Reviews.Content: The worst customer service experience ever seen. the worst experience staying in the hotels...if you can call this place a hotel..... Front desk service doesnt exist! Bed Bugs......im speechless.... Disgusting and disgraceful

Reviews.Title: “Good value for sleep”
Reviews.Author: Robert W
Reviews.Content: Value for sleep. Not as bad as other people said. We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights last month. It is true that not feeling very well when we stepped in the hotel as it is old facility. But the room is much better than what we thought. The towel and bed sheet are new and the ensuite bathroom is cleaned. Most important is we had the place to park our car overnight at a cheap rate. A good place for sleep only at a budget price.

Reviews.Title: “Only if your desprate”
Reviews.Author: Felicity R
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on the weekend with my 2 sisters, none of us had ever been to Sydney before, we booked through wotif or lastminute (not sure as my sister booked). When we arrived we wondered what the we had done as the place smelt like mould or cat urine not sure/ mix of both really. We stayed in a triple share room with three single beds, mattresses were horrendous, and the pillows weren't much thicker then a doona, we only had one pillow each, one towel, no face washers and no bath mat. The bathroom was also horrendous, the toilet wasnt bolted to the floor and we wore thongs to shower as we it was filthy! The small window we did have did not shut completely so we heard trucks and cars coming and going down the alley way all night, the air con rattled and there was a dog in the room next to us and it barked day and night. We also got the waft of cigarette smoke from time to time! We should of been alarmed when we first arrived and they asked us how did we find out about the Parkview Hotel and when one of the options was the department of human services! Do not waste your money!!

Reviews.Title: “I'd rather sleep on a pile of dog turds”
Reviews.Author: p86j
Reviews.Content: this place is a total dump, you literally would be better off sleeping at a dump, on a pile of rubbish. It would probably be cleaner and more comfortable. If you think youre actually going to be able to sleep while staying here, think again. You'll be hiding under your blankets listening, scared for your life with people punching walls, screaming and swearing in the halls. i thought I was actually going to die. I'm not joking. Just when you think it couldnt get any worse, the staff are horrendously rude. Pretty sure I over hear one of them making a drug deal on the phone in reception. No matter how totally desperate you are, I warn you, dont stay here. I'm serious. I dont think I'll ever be the same again.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money..”
Reviews.Author: SydGirls
Reviews.Content: I needed a hotel in a hurry and thought with a great location the hotel would be the same... I was wrong! Room was not cleaned and covered in dust. The floors throughout the hotel were squeaky and you could hear every person walking past like they were in the room with you. I ended up putting a chair behind the door because i didnt feel safe as the fire escape was left open and any person off the street could have walked in. Was woken up at 4am as some drunk girl and her boyfriend were running up and down the hall ( not even sure they were guests ) and a guest had brought dogs that barked all night??!! As a sydney woman I would not recommend to any traveller!!

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here...for the love of god run now!”
Reviews.Author: LeighAlexander
Reviews.Content: This was booked for me through work and I only stayed 30 minutes before I fled in horror, I felt very unsafe. The room was filthy, no windows, no ventilation and the air conditioner did not work properly. There is no security in the building, the fire escapes were open and there were drunks drinking on the bottom steps. The halls were dilapidated and there was a syringe lying in one. There was also graffiti everywhere. I fled and left the key at reception as no one was about, got a rude phone call ten minutes later saying they don't know what i meant by horrid conditions. Don't ever stay here... You have been warned...

Reviews.Title: “Value For Money Haven”
Reviews.Author: simplyrose
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for over a week. Initially I was just looking for a room that befits my budget bracket. if u're travelling in 3s, it don't make sense to check into one of those cheap beds per night. The hotel's location is just beside Broadway Shopping Centre ie. next to Target and a 24hrs Kmart. There's also a reasonable priced foodcourt and Coles in d building. Getting into town is easy enough with a multi travel card. Over the weekends, u'll be grateful that you stay far from the drunkeness of city nights. Oh hey did I mention the hotel faces Victoria Park where they have a swimming pool for public.

Reviews.Title: “rather sleep on the street”
Reviews.Author: reg z
Reviews.Content: I have been to allot oh hotels around the world and Australia and I have slept in everything from a 24 bed dorm to a 5 star $1000 a night room so I have seen some real dives in my time and this place ticks all the boxes of being a real s*hit hole filthy rooms, moldy bathrooms, rude staff and while I was staying the second day my iPod was gone and I was told the hotel was not responsible I knew it was someone from the staff because I had new towels and soap on the third day it was about $30 in coins I have in a side pocket of my bag and people SHOOTING UP DRUGS in the stairwell I booked 4 nights and only stayed because they would not refund my money but I can tell you I would rather sleep in a cardboard box at the train station the stay in this hell hole

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: MiddleAgeAussie
Reviews.Content: Simple. Stay Away. This is awful. Read my other reviews. I'm not a whinger. I know you get what you pay for but this is a disgrace. Found a shop and BOUGHT OUR OWN PILLOWS!!!!!! Trust other tripadvisors who had the same opinion.

Reviews.Title: “Fit for Pigs”
Reviews.Author: kenny009
Reviews.Content: this hotel should be renamed parview pigstay. booked in on 5th jan 2011 and booked out 2 hours later after finding another hotel. the rooms got no fly screen on the windows. it was infested with flies and mosquitoes. bedding was filthy as was toilet and shower. lost my $150 as they did not want to give any re-fund. PLEASE DO NOT even consider staying at this HELL HOLE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: kirti_10
Reviews.Content: As my friends wanted to stay some where close to city, I looked for all the budget hotels close to the city but all of them were fully booked out, this was the only hotel left for that day , i read some of the reviews but i had no choice so decided to stay at Parkview Hotel Sydney but what i found was completely opposite , the location was great, the rooms were pretty good, staffs were friendly and helpful definitely value for money. "I will definitely stay there again"

Reviews.Title: “Worthy for money”
Reviews.Author: SydneyTraveler88
Reviews.Content: My partner and me stay in Parkview 2 nights in mid December. Even it is old but the bathroom and the linen is clean. The front desk staffs are quite helpful. Worthy for budget money for sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay at this hotel - Absolutely Horrid”
Reviews.Author: aussiechic_10
Reviews.Content: Dark, damp, worn out hotel with bad service. This place is not worth the price tag AT ALL. The room is small and dark, inadequate supplies. Only provided with once small cup and teaspoon. When asked reception for a dinner spoon, plate and knife got told that nothing else was available. The bathroom had extremely poor lighting, water spat out of the faucet, took five minutes just to fill a small bottle. The hotel stinks, damp smell everywhere. A shuttle bus was booked for pickup early morning and pre-paid. Did not show up, so had to rush and catch a cab last minute. Useless hotel, unhelpfull, unskilled staff. And lastly, Where is the Parkview?

Reviews.Title: “This should not be called a hotel, perhaps a refuge.”
Reviews.Author: Gen20
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 nights there and were very disappointed. This is worse than a youth hostel. It is ugly, smells of cigarette and greasy food, the taps leak, the carpets are filthy, and it is overpriced ($160/night for a family room). Our room was located on the back of a shopping complex and there was constant noise from the refrigeration of the supermarket. There was a laundry room that was used by external people who were smoking on the emergency stairs. As the place is next to the Salvos, dodgy people seem to be staying there, probably for free as the regular customers likely pay for their accommodation! I have traveled a lot in Europe, the US, North Africa, and Australia. This is the worse place I have ever stayed. This should not be called a hotel, perhaps a refuge.

Reviews.Title: “Smelly dirty dodgy overpriced dump - DO NOT STAY HERE!”
Reviews.Author: MillyCopeland
Reviews.Content: We booked this place online through lastminute.com. The pictures that were on that website at the time I booked did not in any way reflect the reality - grubby piece of crap in a dodgy part of town. I suspect they actually showed a picture of a character building down the street. I was so shocked at the disparity between the online pictures and reality that I checked the site when I returned from holiday - the pictures had been removed. There was no lift and no offer of assistance with your bags either. Our parkview room stunk of paint or perhaps really strong mothballs, it was so strong I had a headache after 15mins. The aircon didn't work and the TV only offers standard channels with bad reception. The couch on the landing for our room was covered in graffitti and there was a party going on in the room next door that stopped at 9.30pm but resumed at 2.30am for an hour when they all arrived home. That was followed by what sounded like some guys trying to break into the room next door at 3.30am. We did not feel safe but we stayed as we'd stupidly paid for the room in advance as it was an online booking. We got through it by reminding ourselves we'd only be there from 8pm-4am and we were heading to something a lot nicer. This is the most overpriced accommodation I've ever stayed in, absolutely disgusting, do not stay here!

Reviews.Title: “EEEEEEWWWWWWWWWWW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: hunypuff
Reviews.Content: Omg what a bloody horrid place!!! Absolutely disgusting!! Theres no lift!! So i had to lug my 2 20kg suitcases up 6 flights of stairs just to get to our room........which was foul!!! It was no bigger than my bedroom at home and had 3 single beds crammed into it, no windows, no aircon or heating, 1 grotty blanket on each bed and 1 spare grotty blanket. But save the best for last...........How disgusting was the bathroom!! The toilet had scum on it so thick it had become waterproof, the shower was filthy, i have added pics. I was cleaner getting in the shower than coming out, if i hadn't desperately needed a wash, i wouldn't have bothered having a shower! Didn't want to sit down on the toilet!! I had my 2 little children with me, it should be illegal for them to rent a room like this especially when they know there are children coming!! Had i been able to afford other accomodation, i would've left!! Tea and coffee and jug provided however teaspoon looked like it had been sucked clean. Could not get over how gross the shower and toilet were. The place had obviously never been dusted either!! Horrible horrible horrible. Recommend anywhere but here!!!! Only good for people needing the rooms for an hour at a time coz thats all they are good for!! My mums back is stuffed from sleeping on the old buggered bed thats obviously seen its fair share of action!! Walls were so gross, i could see big smeared hand prints, the one right beside my bed was absolutely disgusting, would fear what one of their rooms would look like if you shone one of those special lights that show up bodily fluids coz i could see droplets on the wall of......well, god only knows what!

Reviews.Title: “Theives and something very weird!”
Reviews.Author: misspells
Reviews.Content: Relocating..no windows but clean!Drug addicts and drunks and DOH people main clients!Sceaming...battered woman!They play very weird games...they say pay $80 and then change their mind to higher price?Be ready to be abused in foul language and to have aboriginals pea'ing in the stair well...not fit for families or females alone!They will try and say you owe 4-5days more than you do and then take everything in your room and hold it against you..I called police and it was clear they where not truthful,,that's stealing!!Druggy downstairs waiting for dealers in rooms..What the hell??Items stolen from storage???They advertise $50 room after midnight but then say $100 when enquire...very weird conduct from staff..like they have something to hide??Abused me in foul language when I HAD to call police......mainly staffed by temporary Australian students or travellers..........Give it a WIDE MISS!!!!NOT WORTH IT!DO NOT consider this hotel if female or have kids!!

Reviews.Title: “Disgrace”
Reviews.Author: catpetaussie
Reviews.Content: I have never seen anything like it. The disgusting, dirty dump hole which should be demolished. In fact I think my local dump would be cleaner. A fire hazard, dirty bug infected rooms, with broken air conditioner. Stained and soiled bed linen infected with bed bugs and lice. Aroma like the sewer had been sprayed for room freshener. No use complaining as the owner like to live in this filth. definently not Australian stardards and I cannot beleive that they are allowed to get away with providing accomadation in this condition. No lifts and luggage has to be dragged up 3 flights of stairs to the black hole which was to be our room. Yes pets allowed they have there bugs already accomadated, eg lice,fleas, bugs

Reviews.Title: “OK for the price you pay”
Reviews.Author: SunshineCoastJag
Reviews.Content: Big room, quiet if you close the windows - otherwise lots of traffic noise. We left airconditioner (very old - but it worked) on and windows shut to make it quiet. Old little TV - but it worked. Very old linen. Carpets very dirty, so I wore my thongs in our room. Jug/tea/coffee etc provided. Bed a bit old. Lots of things in foyer were out of order, as was the phone in our room. The location was excellent and the pub opposite the park. has fantastic (and cheap) meals. We paid a similar amount for a filthy backpackers in Perth the previous week, so this what pretty good considering that it was a good price for inner Sydney. Don't stay here if you want fancy accommodation. It is very basic - but suited us as we were not spending much time at all in our room. We only needed coffee, shower and bed and they were OK.

Reviews.Title: “The most horrendous hotel ever!! Do not even consider staying here!!”
Reviews.Author: LMAC70
Reviews.Content: This hotel is an absolute filthy pest ridden dump. I would personally risk it sleeping on a park bench in the park opposite than lay my head down on one of their filthy disgusting beds in the windowless prison cell room. The linen is dirty, smelly and very very old. It stinks. Nothing works including the air conditioner and phone to reception. You need to hike down a couple of flights of stairs to even talk to reception just to ask them to turn air conditioner on as they keep the remote control, then you discover it does not even work! The filthy mould ridden dirty bathroom smells like a urinal in a pub and I went to a public toilet rather than use it. We were heading out for an evening at a concert, dinner and then some drinking afterwards, to head back for some rest before driving home after a nice breakfast in the morning. Instead, we spent an hour before concert ringing every hotel so we could get the hell out of here only to find there was not a room left in Sydney. Now out of time, we headed to concert etc.........then sat in a shop waiting for the breathaliser to let us know we could at least drive home and not have to stay in this disgusting hotel. We arrived back at hotel and asked for our car, which was blocked in by two other vehicles. The young lad told us we would have to move the two other guests vehicles if we wanted our car as he did not have a licence. (If you use the carpark here, they will insist on having your car keys!!) We moved the other guests cars and promptly left! I wonder who had driven our vehicle while we were out.......and upon making a dash to our room to grab our bags and run AWAY as fast as we could....the management had put the rat traps out in the hallways (2am) for the huge rat problem they apparently have......these were not out when we checked in. When grabbing our bags we noticed that the roof had leaked while we were away, all over my toiletries bag. This place should be called the HORROR HOTEL and you would be an absolute fool to book here......we absolutely regretted it and could not even bring ourselves to sit or lay on the bed......which was a mattress on the floor. LAST WARNING............DO NOT EVEN CONTEMPLATE THIS HOTEL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Avoid it like the plague. Dark, dirty and dingy.”
Reviews.Author: notoriousone
Reviews.Content: Park view..? What view, there is no view, maybe of an alley behind the "hotel". Carpet needed replacing. Paint job was shoddy. Curtains were stained and old. Air conditioner was noisy and sounded like it was on its last legs. TV screen looks like someone had taken a magnet to it (colour screwed up beyond belief). Bathroom is a dirty deathtrap (and I'm 22 with low standards). The worst part was the shower. It had a significant amount of mold that looked like it had been there for a while + shower door interfered with toilet. Go somewhere else! Believe me.

Reviews.Title: “I won't come back to this hotel in my life”
Reviews.Author: mybayview
Reviews.Content: We were stayed in this Hotel for 4 days. We experience kettle is broken but working in condition, that's all right. TV is not functioned at all luckily got chance to change another room. After that we realized that there was no air-conditioned during mid night. This is not the way to operate a business, kind of cheating to the customer. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Crushed Dreams”
Reviews.Author: hfdakfkjla
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel thinking that it has a park view. Instead, our rooms had no windows! In addition, there was no thermostat in the room to control the air conditioning. When we went to the reception desk at 3am in the morning, the receptionist (only one of them was on duty at night) was sleeping. His service was atrocious, giving me the "I don't want to serve you" kind of look and attitude. He was reluctant to even turn on our aircon in our room. The rooms were extremely filthy. We started getting rashes on the second day. Not knowing the reason, we continued our stay. Just an hour before check out, we noticed that the beddings were very dirty. There were BLOODSTAINS and holes in our bedsheet. The towel looks like a cleaning rag (we're not sure even if they used it for other purposes). The images on its website are deceptive. They took a whole picture of a building, seemingly representing the hotel. Instead, the hotel is only a small crook of the building. Rooms are so close together and walls are so thin. I'm pretty sure you can get better rooms by staying at backpackers at a quarter of the price. DO NOT STAY HERE! Unless you want to pay extras for medical fees for your rashes. Please, don't let your dream holidays be crushed...

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here!!!”
Reviews.Author: ivyangel
Reviews.Content: Absolutely terrible!! Booked two rooms, one room had no windows and the wall was next to an industrial airconditioner which made the walls vibrate and couldn't sleep. The other room had a hole in the ceiling which was covered up with paper stuck to the roof, and once it rained the roof leaked and water was everywhere. Stayed over the new years eve period so it was pricey, but i'll rather pay an extra $50 a night than stay there again. You also need flipflops for the bathroom.

HotelInfo.Name: Parkview Hotel Sydney
HotelInfo.Address: 253 Broadway | PO Box 530, Sydney, New South Wales 2007, Australia
